Alternatively, if you're open to something more adventurous, "Babel" (2006) could be an intriguing choice. While it may not be directly related to literature, the film's themes of connection and understanding between people from different cultures are certainly relevant to literary pursuits. Plus, it features a talented ensemble cast, including Brad Pitt!
